meanings.definition: Resembling a gourd in shape or appearance.
meanings.sent1: The plant had gourdlike leaves that were round and green.
meanings.sent2: The vase had a gourdlike shape, tapering at the top.
meanings.sent3: The gourdlike lampshade cast a warm glow in the room.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as gourdlike as the curve of a pumpkin.
meanings.sent5: The gourdlike fruit hung from the vine, ripe and ready to be picked.

meanings.definition: Having characteristics similar to a gourd.
meanings.sent1: The gourdlike texture of the skin made it rough to touch.
meanings.sent2: The gourdlike sound of the instrument echoed through the room.
meanings.sent3: His gourdlike behavior at the party made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The gourdlike pattern on the fabric added a unique touch.
meanings.sent5: The gourdlike smell of the soup filled the kitchen with warmth.
